overview:
I like to turn good ideas into projects and build great companies that become market leaders.  I founded, invested into and developed over 10 companies with total revenues of over US$1 billion annually in fields such as retail, Internet, IT, telecom, media, cleantech, alternative medicine and Real Estate (USA, Ukraine and other CIS countries).  Young Global Leader (YGL) of World Economic Forum since 2008 www.younggloballeaders.org

Specialties VC, Private Equity, M&A, IT, Internet, cleantech, retail, real estate, alternative investments, startups, Social networks, Smart TV, OTT-IPTV, Wireless,consumer electronics, social media & TV Apps, alternative medicine
